trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The elderly miner is squinting at you with great intensity.
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_TODO_00<tab>Search for the miners.
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_TODO_01<tab>Report to the elderly miner.
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_000<tab>You there! New <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! Where are the others?
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_001<tab>Don't try to play me for a fool, I know what they're up to. No good, that's what! Expect me to pay them for shirking their duties, do they? Bah!
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_002<tab>Go and get them, will you? It's time I gave them a stern talking to!

TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_010<tab>The youth of today, what a shower of shite! In my day we had it tough. We'd be woken up half a bell before we'd went to bed, eat a handful of hot gravel, and─ What are you still gawping at me for, you bloody fool!?
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_020<tab>Ah gods, my aching head... I feel like death warmed up...

TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>It seems the man is suffering from a hangover. If you were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him up, perhaps he might be more inclined to return to his duties.
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_030<tab>All right, all right! Enough of your posing!
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_031<tab>If going back to work's what it takes for you to leave me alone, so be it!
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_040<tab><sigh> Nothing's going my way... I haven't had a decent haul in ages. I might as well just hang up my pickaxe for good.

TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>The man seems to be lacking in motivation. Perhaps if you were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> his spirits, he might be willing to return to work.
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_050<tab>I don't know who you are or what you're doing, but your enthusiasm is somehow...infectious!

TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_051<tab>Yes, I should be thankful for what I have! I've got a steady job, a sort of beautiful home, what more could I ask for? Heigh ho, heigh ho, it's back to work I go!
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_060<tab>Why would she leave me? There's nothing for her in Eulmore! Whatever will I do now?

TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>The man is clearly upset and in no fit state to work. If someone were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him, he might come to his senses.

TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_070<tab>“There, there?” What does that even mean, anyway? <var 1A 02 /var>There<var 1A 01 /var> are people who need me? <var 1A 02 /var>There<var 1A 01 /var> is still work to be done?

TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_071<tab>That's it! I should forget my sorrows by burying myself in my work! Ah, a poor choice of words considering I'm a miner... But enough procrastinating, there's digging to be done!
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_080<tab>Nothing cures a hangover better than spending hours smashing rocks in a dingy mine... Ungh. Kill me now.
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_081<tab>Ha ha, those rocks won't know what hit them!
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_082<tab>Who needs her anyway? I'm married to my job!
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_090<tab>So, the four of you finally decided to show up and do some bloody work, then?

TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_091<tab>Four!? But this <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((bloke)) /var>'s not part of our team, is <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>? As far as I can tell, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s just passing through!
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_092<tab>Eh!? What are you prattling about now?
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_093<tab>Ha ha! My mistake! When you get to my age, one person-shaped blur looks much like all the others. Must be these damned eyes of mine.
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_094<tab>Still, we could use an extra pair of hands around here. I daresay you're worth more than all of these slack-jawed layabouts put together.
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_095<tab>But if you're not here for the mining, you might as well take this as payment for rounding up my workers. Gods help me, they're all I've got.
